com.openxc.enabler.preferences

Class VehiclePreferenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.openxc.enabler.preferences.VehiclePreferenceManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothPreferenceManager, DweetingPreferenceManager, FileRecordingPreferenceManager, GpsOverwritePreferenceManager, NativeGpsPreferenceManager, NetworkPreferenceManager, PhoneSensorSourcePreferenceManager, TraceSourcePreferenceManager, UploadingPreferenceManager, UsbPreferenceManager, VehicleInterfacePreferenceManager

    public abstract class VehiclePreferenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class that collects functionality common to watching shared preferences for changes and altering running services as a result. The preference listeners for each specific group of preferences can be contained in a subclass, instead of all cluttering up the main activity.
